title: Alabama Firm Recalls Beef Jerky Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, June 12, 2013 Hickory Hollow Jerky, LLC, a Eufaula, Ala. establishment, is recalling approximately 1,800 pounds of flavored beef jerky products because of misbranding and an undeclared allergen. The products contain Worcestershire sauce, and fish (anchovy paste) is a subcomponent. Fish is a known...
impacted_products: 3-oz. Original Recipe “HICKORY HOLLOW BEEF JERKY” bearing the establishment number “EST. 34550” inside the USDA mark of inspection on the label.
3-oz. Sweet Heat BBQ “HICKORY HOLLOW BEEF JERKY” bearing the establishment number “EST. 34550” inside the USDA mark of inspection on the label.
3-oz. Hot Shot “HICKORY HOLLOW BEEF JERKY” bearing the establishment number “EST. 34550”inside the USDA mark of inspection on the label.
